==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|は|しゅ}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=はしゅ}} compound {{m|zh|播種|tr=pa<sup>H</sup> tsyowng<sup>X</sup>|lit=to sow + seed}} or {{m|zh|播種|tr=pa<sup>H</sup> tsyowng<sup>H</sup>|lit=to sow + to sow}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|はしゅ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|はしゅ}}

# [[sowing]], the spreading of [[seed]] on the ground for growing a [[crop]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=はんしゅ|medicine}} [[dissemination]] {{qualifier|the spreading out of cells within the body, particularly cells of an invasive disease or of cancer}}

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|播種機|はしゅき}} a [[sower]], a [[device]] or [[machine]] for sowing seeds
* {{ja-r|播種性|はしゅせい}} [[disseminated]] {{qualifier|said of a disease}}
{{der-bottom}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|sowing}} {{ja-r|種蒔き|たねまき}}
* {{sense|dissemination}} {{ja-r|散在|さんざい}}, {{ja-r|汎発|はんぱつ}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|はしゅ}}

# to [[sow]], to [[spread]] [[seed]] on the ground for growing a [[crop]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=はんしゅ|medicine}} to [[disseminate]] {{qualifier|to spread out within the body, particularly for cells of an invasive disease or of cancer}}

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|はしゅ}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|はん|しゅ}}
Variation of ''hashu'' above, using the [[慣用音#Japanese|''kan'yōon'']] of ''han'' for the first character.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=ky|はんしゅ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|はんしゅ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=はんしゅ|medicine}} [[dissemination]] {{qualifier|the spreading out of cells within the body, particularly cells of an invasive disease or of cancer}}

=====Usage notes=====
Although some dictionaries<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="goo">http://dictionary.goo.ne.jp/leaf/jn2/149124/m3u/%E6%92%AD%E7%A8%AE/</ref> list this separate reading with a distinct sense, other dictionaries<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref> do not list any ''hanshu'' reading, and include the {{m|en|dissemination}} sense under the ''hashu'' reading.
